biblStruct.note: The article deals with the note on the history of the Greek language and the Greek script as found in the Kitāb al-Fihrist by Ibn an-Nadim. The author analyses the composition of the passage as well as the ways and methods applied to transcribe the Greek technical linguistic terms with Arabic letters. The results obtained invite a strong suggestion that the note as a whole was not written by Ibn an-Nadim himself but was constructed on the basis of the material from the Greek manual On the rule of theʾiʿrāb according to the teaching of the Greeks composed by Ḥunayn ibn Isḥāq (d. 873 AD).
